name: Canada, Gananoque Island
pere: Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries of Chaos, there live the blind texts.

name: France, Eiffel Tower
pere: Experience the beauty of Paris with a visit to the iconic Eiffel Tower and its surroundings.

name: Japan, Mount Fuji
pere: Explore the serene beauty of Mount Fuji and immerse yourself in Japanese culture.

name: Australia, Sydney Opera House
pere: Discover the vibrant city of Sydney and visit the world-famous Opera House.

name: Italy, Venice Canals
pere: Enjoy a romantic gondola ride through the picturesque canals of Venice.
